component.name: Oomox theme designer
component.summary: customize icons, xrdb and GTK themes

description.p: Graphical application for generating different color variations of Numix and Materia (ex-Flat-Plat) themes (GTK2, GTK3), gnome-colors and ArchDroid icon themes. Have a hack for HiDPI in gtk2.
WARNING: Materia and Oomoxify plugins are temporary disabled for Flatpak.
